text: is an Xbox 360 game. It is a sequel to the 2008 game Otomedius G (Gorgeous!) by Konami, a spin-off of the Gradius series. Otomedius Excellent features female characters representing different Konami franchises riding on vehicles or with flying armor. It was released in April 21, 2011 in Japan and in North America on November 8, 2011. title: Otomedius Excellent
